text: @SethAbramson The Coronavirus Rally is a fate d’comple at this point. Continuing to bemoan the fact only gives it more credence to his supporters, doesn’t stop it from going forward and keeps the sociopath happy with the building violence.  Everything you say is true, but it doesn’t change it.
